ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The Maximal Warrior sttod before the great council. The mighty optimal Optimus delivered his orders. Brix Prime, you are to take you crew to the Neo Beast

The Maximal Warrior sttod before the great council. The mighty 
optimal Optimus delivered his orders.

"Brix Prime, you are to take you crew to the Neo Beast Wars. With the 
added 10 people we will finaly stop Hell Beast."(Optimus is unaware 
of the peace treaty being implimented.)

"Yes sir! We will leave immediatly!"

______________________________________________________________________

The young Maximal Octociz was saying good-bye to everyone he cared 
about. He was going to war. A war he might not return from. He looks 
at their faces one more time, and boards his ship. the Mirorition. 
His captain, Brix Prime is there, and all of his buddies. They are 
very chummy today. They don't know if they will be back.

"Let's go." said Brix.

And so the Mirorition pulled out from Cybertron, starting there 
journey. After a few days of space and time travelling, they finaly 
saw it. The place where the Wars are being held. Suddenly, there was 
a problem.

"The ship isn't steering correctly, sir!"

"Probebly the preds fidling with us. Where are we headed?"

"Right for the moon!!"

"Brace for impact!"

The ship crashed right into the moon, causing much damade. Most of 
the crew was killed on impact. The only survivors were Brix Prime, 
Octociz and another maximal named Gekkidama. Brix immediatly took 
control.

"To the stasis pods!"

On the run, a barrier fell right onto gekkidama. They tried to lift 
it, but they saw the damage. In a few moments, Gekkidama had died. 
They aid good-bye and than left for the pods.

Once they got there, only one of them had not been fried. Brix 
optided to give it to Octociz.

"I must stay with my ship. It is more important to get you to safety. 
I will start building a minture ship from scrap parts here, and maybe 
you can launch a rescue mission. I will be fine."

So Octociz said good-bye and hoped into the pod. Brix launched him, 
and there he was travelling towards earth, the only one out of the 10 
on the Mirorition. In a short time his pod landed, but in the water! 
After all this strugling, he would still die from rusting. than he 
remembered something Brix told him.

"Earth has different conditions that our robot modes cannot take. We 
wil be changing them so that we may function."

The pod starting a scanning process, and soon he began to feel the 
changes. When he was done and got out of the pod, he found he liked 
the water. He had 8 slimy arms and a bulging out head. He knew it 
all. He swam up to the surface, lept into the air and transformed to 
Beast mode. He was Octociz the Octopus, the Maximal, and he was here 
to fight the Neo Beast Wars. He ran off in search of the other 
maximals.

















--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::DarkMouse::
> She turned and walked down the hallway.  She felt like crying. Why 
did she 
> feel like this.  She talked to herself.
> "Well, after just walking off like that, he's bound to think I'm 
some sort 
> of jerk or something.  Nice going DarkMouse.  Just blow your chance 
to get 
> things straightened out."  She started to feel the tears well up in 
her 
> optics and she ran to her room and slammed the door shut with a 
loud BANG!
>
